body_content.explanation: a sweet food consisting of an open pastry case (= a layer of pastry covering the bottom and sides of a shallow dish) filled with fruit jam  and covered with thin strips of pastry flavoured with almonds:
examples: The Austrian Linzer torte is often eaten at Christmas.
The linzer torte was good, but not as buttery as I would have liked.
The original Linzer Torte came from Austria and usually includes almonds in the pastry.
